content: it s shaun the sheep my kiddos love shaun and all his antics so i thought of no better way to add to their fun than with a large plushie **a word about yardage needed ** *unfortunately i didn t keep track of exactly how much yardage was used but i will say the bobble sts use a lot of yarn as an estimate i d say 1200-1600 yards based on a plushie of similar size and assuming that bobble sts take 3-4 times more yarn than regular single_crochet and the other plushie s yardage estimate was accurate i hope that helps * ***-abigail*** finished size about 15 38cm seated when using worsted weight yarn and 3 5mm hook notions u s size e-4 3 5 mm hook large eyed blunt tipped yarn needle stitch marker fiberfill stuffing worsted weight yarn this project uses the following techniques all terms are u s magic_ring chain stitch chain single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch bobble stitch explanation included single_crochet two together decrease decrease half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet i don t own the rights to shaun the sheep as much as i would like to the character is property of his owners and this pattern is a work of fan appreciation this pattern is an original design © abigail gonzalez chanteuse crochet all rights reserved this pattern may not be sold or otherwise distributed or altered
